original_text: And I was advancing in Judaism beyond many of my own age among my people, so extremely zealous was I for the traditions of my fathers.
korean_text: 내가 내 동족 중 여러 연갑자보다 유대교를 지나치게 믿어 내 조상의 전통에 대하여 더욱 열심이 있었으나

sentences.original_text: And I was advancing in Judaism
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 유대교에서 더욱 발전하고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: beyond many of my own age
so extremely zealous was I for the traditions of my fathers
sentences.korean_translation: 내 조상의 전통을 위해 극도로 열심이었습니다
